title: Bauzi (2008) New Testament (Print) SABDA
description: The New Testament translated into Bauzi in 2008 by Bible League Indonesia. Bauzi is a Papuan language of the East Geelvink Bay family spoken in the Indonesian province of Papua.

language.name: Bauzi
language.area: Jayapura and Yapen Waropen regencies. Lake Holmes area near mid-Mamberamo River; Danau Bira area, northeast, Kasonoweja north of Kustera; Mamberamo Tengah and Waropen Atas subdistricts, Vakiadi, Noiadi, Danau Bira, Solom, Kustera, Neao, Itaba villages.
